item.title: My First Page
item.description:
Hello World!

More works need to be done:

  1. currently, the page has to be generated, then:

$ make publish

$ cd output

$ git init

$ git add --all

$ git commit -m "the changes"

$ git push https://github.com/zhwa/zhwa.github.io.git
item.dc:creator: Zhe Wang
